txt.en:
'These strange black wolves stalk Fordirith, particularly at night as the shadows grow long and the sun is hidden from view.

'These fell spirits hunt us with dark purpose, [placeholder], and if our company is to pass safely, we must slay as many as we can and drive them back to their lairs.

'Go forth, my friend, and aid us with your prowess. Drive back this shadow, so that we may fulfill our purpose in the South.'
'These fell spirits are relentless, [placeholder]. Despite your efforts, these creatures reappear in full number.\n\n'Ah well, I must thank you for your efforts nonetheless.'
'Deal with the Shadow-wolves, [placeholder]...they are a great threat to our quest.'
Shadow-wolves stalk the lands of Fordirith, hunting the members of the Grey Company with deadly intent.

At night, Shadow-wolves can be found throughout the region, but during the light of day they seem to lair in and around the Black Dens only.\n\nAmarion has asked you to defeat several of the Shadow-wolves that stalk Fordirith.
Talk to Amarion at Echad Dagoras
Amarion is at Echad Dagoras, north-west of the Black Dens.\n\nYou should bring news of your success to Amarion.
